wikipedia_page.main: Myles Elliot Zach Hippolyte (born 9 November 1994) is an English professional footballer who plays for Scunthorpe United as a winger. A product of the Brentford Academy, he moved to Scotland in 2014 and played for Livingston, Falkirk and St Mirren, before joining for Dunfermline Athletic in 2018. He returned to England a year later to play for Yeovil Town.
